author: Special Correspondent
text:
Munneerpallam police have arrested a youth for allegedly chopping off the wrist of his younger sister.

The police said that P. Velmurugan (21) of Puthukkulam under Munneerpallam police station limits attacked his 17-year-old sister with a sickle, chopping off her left wrist, on Monday morning, and escaped. During investigation, the police found that the girl used to speak to her cousin, also from Puthukkulam, which was opposed by Velmurugan.

As she chose to ignore her brother’s opposition and continued to speak to the boy, Velmurugan chopped off the wrist of the girl, a class XI student.

The victim was rushed to Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital where the surgeons performed a marathon surgery. Though the girl was saved, it is not immediately clear if the reunited part would function normally. “It will take at least a couple of weeks to ascertain it,” said a doctor.
title: Youth arrested for chopping off sister’s wrist
